description: This Java class defines a Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for an airport facility service, including welcome, documentation redirection, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller that provides basic endpoints for airport facility service, including welcome, documentation redirection, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to the user.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the requester to the Swagger UI page, constructing the URL based on the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the application health status as 'OK'.
